Rachel Sykes
Legacy Adoption Services - West
1545 Keystone Ave.
Lansing, MI, 48911-4039
Re: License #: CB330361250
Dear Ms. Sykes:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced agency completed on
November 17, 2023. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with
applicable licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (517) 899-6024.
Sincerely,
Heather Reilly, Licensing Consultant
enclosure

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The agency is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility did not require technical assistance during this review.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility did not request consultation during this review.
VI. EVALUATION OF PERIOD UNDER REVIEW
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
There were no incidents of substantiated corporal punishment during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans during
this period under review.
Chief Administrator Assessment
The Chief Administrator Assessment was reviewed and discussed. The agency
did not have a Corrective Action Plan for 2022. The agency reported they continue
to discuss and monitor on-going compliance through internal systems, including
utilization of their Quality Manager. In addition, the agency has been working with
2

MDHHS to address systemic delays to timely permanency for children eligible for
adoption.
Financial Overview
No financial concerns were noted.
Staff and Youth Interviews
One adoption staff was interviewed. They reported being happy with their position
at the agency. Their supervisor is available, supportive, and knowledgeable. Co-
workers are supportive with one another. The agency as a whole is honest and
upfront. Over the past year there have been some difficult changes but everyone
worked well together to be successful. Staff did not have any concerns or
suggestions for improvement.
Description of Agency Walk Through
The agency continues to be located in the same office as the 2022 review. The
office continues to have sufficient space for staff and clients. There is adequate
secure storage for confidential information.
VII. FIELD ANALYST FINDINGS
Not applicable- this agency is licensed for adoption only.
VIII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. It is recommended that the agency continue on their
regular license.
November 17, 2023
Heather A Reilly Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
November 30, 2023

Rorie Dodge-Pifer Date
